sense.def:
Kadar je človek
alert
, je zelo pozoren na tisto, kar se dogaja.

seg.quote: We have to be alert all the time and look for our opportunity.
The job requires constant alertness and vigilance.

sense.def:
Kadar je človek
alert to something
, se tistega popolnoma zaveda.

seg.quote: They were both alert to the dangers.

sense.def:
An alert
so okoliščine, v katerih se ljudje pripravijo na nevarnost.

seg.quote: The city centre was on a nuclear alert.

sense.def:
Kadar je človek
on the alert
, je pripravljen soočiti se z vsem, kar bi se lahko zgodilo.

To alert someone
pomeni opozoriti drugega človeka na nevarnost ali težave.

seg.quote: He pressed the horn of the vehicle to alert the squadron.
